column4: Looking for some assistance setting up 6.10 with multiple monitors -- not the usual questions though - the live CD won't work with my video card (Nvidia FX 5200) , so I think I need to do a manual install -- do I use the alterntive install CD for that, or do I throw switches on the live cd ?
Did you try the LiveCD boot option for safe video (i think that's what it's called)?
kk, sounds like you'll need the alternate CD then :|
the alternate cd uses a text-mode installer.  You can try various X drivers from there
